import React from 'react'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import FormControlLabel from '@material-ui/core/FormControlLabel'; import Checkbox from '@material-ui/core/Checkbox'; export default function PersonalForm() { const [checked, setChecked] = React.useState(true); const handleChange = (event) => { setChecked(event.target.checked); }; return ( {/* Shipping address */}
} label="Use this address for payment details" /> ); }
